column4: I'm getting constant repeating errors while I try to fsck my media drive in root/safe mode. Every 50 seconds... "sd 5:0:0:0 [sdc] Asking for cache data failed", then "sd 5:0:0:0 [sdc] Assuming drive cache: write through".  12.01LTS system will no longer boot due to this error.  Any clues?
BTW:  sdc is not plugges in
if the drive cache is failing you might be able to use hdparm to force it to bypass the cache
